citations.narrative:
The licensee moved to a new location and failed to notify APHIS Animal Care of the change in address. Failure to notify
Animal Care of a change in location can make it difficult to verify regulated activities. A licensee shall notify Animal Care
no fewer than 90 days before any change in the name, address, management, substantial control or ownership of his
business or operation, locations, activities, and number or type of animals. Correct by: October 11, 2023.
This inspection report was emailed to the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee moved to a new location and failed to notify APHIS Animal Care of the change in address. Failure to notify 
Animal Care of a change in location can make it difficult to verify regulated activities. A licensee shall notify Animal Care 
no fewer than 90 days before any change in the name, address, management, substantial control or ownership of his 
business or operation, locations, activities, and number or type of animals. Correct by: October 11, 2023. 
 
This inspection report was emailed to the licensee.
